meanings.definition: A type of plant with small yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The alfilaria in the field swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I planted some alfilaria in my backyard garden.
meanings.sent3: The alfilaria decided to throw a party for the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like an alfilaria in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow alfilaria brightened up the whole garden.

meanings.definition: The act of planting alfilaria in a garden.
meanings.sent1: Gardening enthusiasts enjoy the alfilaria planting process.
meanings.sent2: She dedicated her weekend to alfilaria in her garden.
meanings.sent3: The alfilaria planting contest was a hit in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to alfilaria planting was as strong as oak.
meanings.sent5: The garden flourished with the addition of new alfilaria plants.

meanings.definition: The smell of alfilaria is pleasant.
meanings.sent1: The sweet scent of alfilaria filled the air.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to the alfilaria fragrance in spring.
meanings.sent3: The alfilaria perfume became all the rage in town.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were intertwined with the comforting smell of alfilaria.
meanings.sent5: The gentle aroma of alfilaria brought back childhood memories.
